data.title: Language Spoken In Nicaragua
data.text:
Main Languages Spoken in Nicaragua: Spanish 97.5% (official), Miskito 1.7%, other 0.8% (1995 census).

Do you know how to order your food in Spanish? Talk to the locals in Nicaragua with our Spanish holiday language phrases guide.

The Spanish language phrases guide shows you how to say the every day phrases to ordering food at restaurants in Nicaragua. Order your Spanish language phrase guide from Spanish Phrase Guide.

Spanish Language Lessons Online for Beginners – There are several free Spanish language lesson for beginners, with basic Spanish phrases and video clips to help you pronounce Spanish words easily.

Spanish Language Lessons Online for Business – Are you looking for Spanish language courses for you or your company’s staff? Several Spanish language schools in your area offer private Spanish tuition classes or small Spanish classes.
